sourcesContent:
import translate from '../../data/staticTranslate' import countryData from '../../data/country' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import localize from '../../data/localize' const Delivery = ({ state, setState, error, onBlur, setError}) => { const router = useRouter() const {lang} = localize(router.locale) const handleChange = (name, value) => { let newState = state; setError({...error, [name]: false}) newState[name] = value; setState({...newState}) } return (
onBlur('email')} value={state.email} onChange={(e) => handleChange('email', e.target.value)} tabIndex="1"/>
handleChange('phone', e.target.value)} tabIndex="2"/>
handleChange('name', e.target.value)} tabIndex="3"/>
handleChange('surname', e.target.value)} tabIndex="4"/>
handleChange('city', e.target.value)} tabIndex="6"/>
handleChange('address', e.target.value)} tabIndex="7"/>
handleChange('code', e.target.value)} tabIndex="8"/>
) } export default Delivery
